docs.title: HTML Basics
docs.text: This documentation includes the basic structure of an HTML document along with commonly used html tags.

docs.title: Structure
docs.text:
This is the fundamental structure of html.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>My Website</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <p>Hello world!</p>
  </body>
</html>
  • <!DOCTYPE html> - tells the browser what is the version of the html document.
  • <head></head> - contains all the metadata about the webpage including the title.
  • <body></body> - contains the main content of your webpage.

docs.title: HTML Tags
docs.text:
Most tags must start with opening tag <tag_name> and ends with closing tag </tag_name>.

Example
<h1>My Website</h1>

Some tags does not need closing tag and those are called Self-closing tag.

Example
<input type="text">

Note

HTML files must end with .html for example index.html.

docs.title: Text Formatting
docs.text:
<b>Bold text</b>
<strong>Strong text</strong>
<i>Italic text</i>
<em>Emphasized text</em>
<mark>Marked text</mark>
<small>Smaller text</small>
<del>Deleted text</del>
<ins>Inserted text</ins>
Subscript text <sub>sub</sub>
Superscript text <sup>sup</sup>
